content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the plunge district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the court awarded the applicant an apartment basement and certain movable property while the defendant was awarded a car and other movable property the court also ordered the applicant to compensate the defendant with €7990 both parties will continue to be responsible for certain credit agreements with third parties the court also mentioned various aspects related to matrimonial property and the division of assets between spouses the court will consider the evidence and arguments presented by both parties to make a decision on the dissolution of the marriage and the division of property and financial obligations the court also ordered the defendant to pay €246 in costs and €1057 in stamp duty to the state budget
